name: The only thing they Kinda Soup Is YOU!
name_original: The only thing they Kinda Soup Is YOU!
description:
They are weird, rude without soup, but you, you will be Campbell.

Shoot and soup until is Done!

Immerse yourself in an art gallery where you as a soup can want to protect the art from evil and weird creatures!

Try the Doom-like Survival Game made on Unity For the Paintjam 2021.

Creators:

Elias Wickander,Pontus AY,Massimo Mezzalira

Game made in less than 48 Hours
